manifest.name: Game-based quiz app developed by THM
manifest.description: A bit like Kahoot!, a bit like Socrative, but lots of ARSnova!

cookie_consent.message:
answer✦jetzt is a free game-based quiz app from the ARSnova team at Mittelhessen University of Technology. The WebApp can also be accessed directly via https://antworte.jetzt.

antworte✦jetzt uses additional cookies.

base.title: Base Functions
base.description: These cookies are required for the functionality of this website and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Statistics
analytics.description: We use these cookies to improve our website.

global.console-log-warning: WARNING! This will not help you cheat on any quiz! Anyone who told you to use these tools could try to compromise your computer.
global.loose-data-warning: With this navigation data loss is possible - do you want to proceed?

no-data-error.title: Error while loading data
no-data-error.load-to-edit: The data for the requested page could not be loaded. Please do not use the browser's navigation as data loss is possible. You can go to the quiz overview or to the home page now.
no-data-error.load-to-play: The data for the requested page could not be loaded. Please do not use the browser's navigation as data loss is possible. The quiz round must be quit now. You can only return to the home page.

description.qr-code: Attendees can scan the QR code via their mobile devices to join the quiz.
description.sound: Set the sound for the background music or the countdown here.
description.reading-confirmation: Activate this option if only the question <bold>without</bold> answer options should be displayed first. Only those who confirm the reading (understanding) of the question can participate in the quiz. The number of confirmations is displayed. With the reading confirmation you can create the same conditions for all attendees at the countdown.
description.response-progress: Do you want to display the number of responses to the individual answer options during the countdown? Then activate this option. Note, however, the psychological effect: People tend to be directed to the majority (herd instinct).
description.nicknames: You can preset selectable nicknames out of multiple categories here. Hint: Block a rude nickname by clicking on the attendee in the quiz lobby.
description.confidence-slider: Active that option, which if you want that the participants can see the certainty of answering in hundreds during the vote: 0 % »guessed« - 100 % »absolutely safe«. The average would be indicated in the results diagram.

about.title: Info
about.declaration:
A little Kahoot!,
a little Socrative,
a lot ARSnova!
about.ars: antworte✦jetzt is an innovative Audience-Response-System (ARS) for public educational institutions.
about.developed_by: Inspired by Kahoot! and Socrative developed by computer science students of THM the gamified alternative to the flagship ARSnova.

requirements.1: Absolute data privacy: No personal files on the server. All quiz data is located at the HTML5 Local Storage of the quiz owner.
requirements.2: No registration, no installation, no costs at all
requirements.3: Same landing page for both roles: quiz master and player
requirements.4: Anyone can create quizzes: immediately and as much as you like!
requirements.5: Accessible and for projectors optimized user interface
requirements.6: TeX-Formulas and text formatting with Markdown in questions and answer options
requirements.7: One dialog fits everything: As many answer options you like with multiple choice, single choice and surveys.
requirements.8: ABC...-Quizzes can be created by entering ABC... as the quiz name with one click. The number of consecutive letters determines the answer options.
requirements.9: Edutainment: Have fun during learning with a live competition against the clock and the other players with sound effects.
requirements.10: Bonus option: The top players receive »tokens«, which they can redeem for bonus points by emailing the teacher.
requirements.11: Responsive Web design: Whether smartphone, beamer or wide screen, the design scales. Even complex quizzes can be created on the smartphone.
requirements.12: Built as Progressive Web App in reactive web technology

text.2: Just type in the name of the quiz. The buttons will be activated as soon as you either enter the name of an unlocked quiz: »Join in!« or create a quiz with the entered name: »New Quiz«.
text.3: Now it is as simple as: Clicking. Looking. Quizzing.

tos.declaration: Everyone ( not only teachers ) is allowed to use the quiz app antworte✦jetzt for their own purposes as long as this does not violate German or EU law.

license.title: License
license.text: antworte✦jetzt is a free web service (Software as a Service). The software is Open Source and is licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0.

musicLicense.title: Music license
musicLicense.text: The sound Chinese Gong by Daniel Simon is licensed under CC BY 3.0.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.text: We are trying to maintain the online service of antworte✦jetzt reliable but we cannot guarantee that. The quiz files are located exclusively in the local browser storage of the quiz owner. We do not give any legal responsibility for any data loss for example via deleting the local browser storage or by illegal usage of the service.

data_privacy.declaration: This privacy statement explains to users of antworte✦jetzt the kind, scope and purpose of the usage of personal data by the responsible provider. The legal basis of this privacy policy can be found in the German Bundesdatenschutzgesetz (BDSG) and the German Telemediengesetz (TMG).

app_data.title: Application data
app_data.text: All quiz questions and their answer options are held by the local browser storage of the quiz owner.

access_data.title: Access data
access_data.text: Besides web server log files, no personal access data is stored.

logfiles.title: Webserver logfiles
logfiles.text: The provider collects log files about every access to the antworte✦jetzt system in so-called log files. The provider uses the data exclusively for statistical purposes, for the purpose of operation, security and the optimization of the service. The provider reserves the right to check the log data if there is a reasonable suspicion of unlawful use due to concrete indications.

3rdparty.title: 3rd party services
3rdparty.text: In quizzes third party services or content, such as videos from YouTube and Vimeo or graphics can be included from other websites. This requires that the provider of such content percive the user's IP address. Without the IP address the content can not be sent to the browser.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: Cookies are small files that make it possible to save specific (related to the device) information of the user inside the access device. The offer antworte✦jetzt uses cookies to observe statistical data of website's usage by Matomo (see below) to be able to detect and analyze them in order to improve the offer. The user can influence the use of cookies. Most browsers have an option to limit the storage and usage of cookies or prevent the usage of cookies completely.

piwik.title: Matomo
piwik.text: This offer uses Matomo, an open source software for statistical analysis of traffic, see matomo.org. Matomo uses cookies, which are stored on the computer of the user and allow the analysis of your use of the website. The information generated by the cookie about your use of this service is stored on the provider's server in Germany. The IP address is anonymized immediately after processing and before the storage. The user can refuse the use of cookies by changing the settings of their browser software.

text.1: The operation of the web app antworte✦jetzt is a free service of the TransMIT-Gesellschaft für Technologietransfer mbH, Projektbereich für mobile Anwendungen.
text.3: Fachbereich MNI – Mathematik, Naturwissenschaften und Informatik

quiz-pool.question-amount-warning: Please notice that redundant questions with multiple Tags will only be included once in your quiz. The amount of questions in your quiz can be lower than the selected {amount} questions.

optin.check: Check if you want to enable Twitter features

answeroptions.show_answer_content_on_buttons: Display the answer's content on the buttons?
answeroptions.show_one_answer_per_row: Show only one answer per row?
answeroptions.emoji_info:
You can embed also one of these Emojis (external website!)
Simply click on the website on the Emoji and paste it into the answeroption.

description.default_answer_row: Drag this block into the list of answeroptions to create a new one.
description.added_answers: Here are all already created answeroptions. You can change the order of the answers via drag & drop.
description.show_answer_content_on_buttons: The response buttons for the participants can either be labeled with the letter of the response or the complete answer's text. Note, however, that too much text in the answer can be badly readable depending on the size of the viewport.
description.show_one_answer_per_row: This will increase the width of the answer option button to use the full width of the row. Use this for large formulas or texts.
description.multiple_selection_survey: Here you can set whether the participants are to go directly to the evaluation after clicking on a response of the survey, or whether a multiple selection should be possible.
description.range_area: Here you can specify the correct answer as well as the top and lower tolerances. Please note that the input must be in natural numbers.
description.min_range: Here you can set the lower tolerance value.
description.max_range: Here you can set the upper tolerance value.
description.free_text_question_text: Here you can enter the correct answer. The responses entered by the participants are checked against this response according to the configuration.
description.check_answer: Here you can test possible answers of the participants against your reference value and the current configuration.

free_text_question.title: Free text answer
free_text_question.config_trim_whitespaces: Observe white spaces in the answer
free_text_question.check_correct: The entered answer matches the provided reference.
free_text_question.check_incorrect: The entered answer does not match the provided reference.

choose_nickname.nickname_blacklist_popup: This name is (because of its meaning) not available!

description.nickname_input: Here you can enter a name, which is different from the other players.

name_management.no_sessions: There are no quizzes stored in your browser.

name_management.public-quizzes: Looking for more? Click here to choose from a list of {amount} public {amount, plural, =0{quizzes} one{quiz} other{quizzes}}!

quiz_summary.no_selected_nicks: No nicknames selected. All nicknames are valid.

description.question_group_validation: The validation of the quiz round fails if the quiz has not yet been completed. This includes non - existing quizzes, missing or incomplete response options, non - set timers, etc.
description.restrict_to_cas: If this setting is active, the participants must register at the central authentication service of the University of Applied Sciences Mittelhessen in order to participate in the quiz
description.question_item: This section contains information about the selected question.
description.validation_errors: The validation errors listed here can be useful in troubleshooting.

quiz_summary.no-timer: No countdown set. The quiz round must be stopped manually.

required-for-token.title: Mandatory Question

difficulty.title: Difficulty

difficulty.very-easy: Very easy (+ {multiplicator, plural, one{Normale} other{#-fache} } x score)

timer.description: Here you can set the countdown for the quiz question. As soon as it expires, or all participants have answered, the quiz round is ended.

confidence_level.title: How confident are you in your answer?

membergroup-manager.title: Organize players in teams
membergroup-manager.create-team-placeholder: Enter a team name here. Start with a colon to search for emojis…

validation-error.full-member-group: All available teams were already created. Please remove a team first.
validation-error.invalid-member-group: Invalid name. Please do not mix emojis and regular text
validation-error.add-second-group: Please add at least 2 teams or remove the existing one

login.title: Please enter your login credentials
login.login-via-token: You can also log in with a token:

description.title:
You can add tags to your question here. Which one you use is up to you.
Some recommendations regarding quiz tags:

0.dt: Use multiple tags with coarse and fine granular subject areas
0.dd: A good example would be both the Tags »Mathematics« and »Differential Calculus«.

1.dd: For questions for pupils you can e.g. specify the grade level. In general, tags with a subject should always be preferred.

2.dt: No course names for university questions
2.dd: Subjects of university courses are usually not applicable to other universities. Questions which cannot be exactly associated by their subject are confusing. Use tags related to a subject in this case.

3.dd: If you are writing a Question eg. in German, do not use Englisch Tags, then. Please make sure you are using correct spelling and grammar. Only then questions with the same tags can be grouped to a quiz without effort.

4.dd: You can find and inspiration in the word cloud below. If you have no match in the search field just keep on typing and create a new tag.

title.2: Enter »Demo Quiz« and run it. Use the app in another browser and play the quiz in different roles.
title.3: Visit our project blog and learn how to use bonus quizzes to motivate learning in class.

success.can-create: This quiz name is available. You can create a quiz with it!

quiz-save.access-allowed-for: Access to this quiz is allowed for:
quiz-save.title: Settings for saved quizzes

server-unavailable-modal.title: The connection to the server has been dropped!
server-unavailable-modal.connection-dropped: The quiz can't be played further until the connection to the server is established again. We are currently trying to reconnect. You can also reload the page manually.

swupdate.message: There is a new version of antworte✦jetzt available. Please click here to reload the page. This will install the update automatically.
swupdate.title: New version available

can-use-token.message: You have achieved a bonus token. Click here to view the token
can-use-token.title: Bonustoken available

users.title: Users online
users.content: All connections to antworte✦jetzt are counted here. Of course the data is anonymized. It is not possible to draw conclusions about individual persons. For you the number is a good indication of how much antworte✦jetzt is currently used.

total-quizzes.title: Quizzes
total-quizzes.content: All quizzes are counted here. Including yours! Of course your quizzes are private and only you can start them. No one can access your quizzes!

active-quizzes.title: Active quizzes
active-quizzes.content: This is the number of all the quizzes currently being played. Either their quiz lobby is opened or the quiz round has started.

total-pool-questions.title: Pool questions
total-pool-questions.content: In the question pool you can provide quiz questions for the public. Everyone can compile their own quizzes from the pool questions.

total-pool-tags.title: Tags
total-pool-tags.content: You can assign any tag you like to a question you put in the pool. This way, pool questions can be compiled by topic.

active-participants.title: Active players
active-participants.content: Here you can see the current number of all players in active quizzes. Of course, we attach great importance to data protection: it is not possible to identify individual persons or to track their actions. Don't worry, this is only a rough indication of how much antworte✦jetzt is currently used.

average-participants.title: Players per quiz
average-participants.content: The number indicates the average number of people who took part in quizzes.

outdated-version.title: Your version of antworte✦jetzt is outdated

1.header: Please update your version of antworte✦jetzt. This is important to ensure that you receive the latest features and bug fixes.

solution.1: Press the button to check for updates. The page will reload after a few seconds.
solution.2: If that does not happen click here to follow to the next step

2.header: Alright, that didn't work. Try a »Hard-Reload« now

solution.windows: Hold down the »Ctrl« key and press »F5«
solution.linux: Hold down the »Ctrl« key and press »F5«
solution.mac: Hold down both »⌘« and »⇧« and press then the key »R«

3.header: Please reset your browser cache now.

solution.chrome:
Click in the top right on the symbol with the three dots. Look for »More Tools« and select the option »Clear browsing data«.

Important! To prevent data loss make sure that you have only ticked the box with »Cached images and files«.

Click on »Clear Data« and reload the page.
solution.firefox:
Click in the top right on the symbol with the hamburger bars and select »Library« and then »History«. Now click on »Clear Recent History…«.

Important! To prevent data loss make sure that you have only ticked the boxes with »Cache« and »Offline Website Data«.

Click on »OK« and reload the page.
solution.safari: You'll find at the Apple Support a manual how to reset the cache
solution.ios: Please check individually for your browser vendor how to reset the cache. You'll find at the Apple Support a manual how to reset the cache
solution.android: Please check individually for your browser vendor how to reset the cache. You'll find at the Google Support a manual how to reset the cache

solution.1: Please write an E-Mail to the support
solution.2: You can close this window but it is possible that the App does not work properly for you.

markdown_bar.info_content: You can use Markdown markup for your text in antworte✦jetzt. Frequently used markup options are available via the button bar which is visible on all supported input fields. Additionally antworte✦jetzt supports GitHub Flavored Markdown

sound.finish_music_detailed: Sound at the end of the Countdown

allow-stream-to-clients.title: Allow audio for attendees
allow-stream-to-clients.label: This deactivates the audio for the quiz master and activates it for the attendees. Since the start time of the music is not synchronized it is only advised to activate this feature if the attendees are participating remotely at the quiz.

error_messages.invalid_input_data: The entered data is either invalid or the access is denied!
error_messages.duplicate_user: You are attempting to participate with a second identity. This is not possible!
error_messages.too_much_active_quizzes: There are currently too much quizzes active.
error_messages.server_password_required: Creating a quiz on this server requires a password.
error_messages.no_preview_available: The preview is currently not available!

edit_session_confirmation.title: Do you want to edit the quiz?
edit_session_confirmation.text: All attendees will be removed from the quiz.

return_to_lobby.title: Warning
return_to_lobby.text:
If you proceed to the quiz lobby all played quiz rounds will be reset.

If you need the current quiz-data, you should export it before continuing.

description.SingleChoiceQuestion: Single-choice questions contain as many answer options as you like, one of them must be marked as correct.
description.YesNoSingleChoiceQuestion: Yes|No questions contain only two answers (yes and no), one of them must be marked as correct.
description.TrueFalseSingleChoiceQuestion: True|False questions also contain only two answers (True and False), one of them must be marked as correct.
description.MultipleChoiceQuestion: Multiple-choice questions contain as many answer options as you like, of which as many as you like (at least one) can be marked as correct.
description.RangedQuestion: For the ranged question, an integer must be specified as correct. In addition, upper and lower tolerances can be entered.
description.FreeTextQuestion: In the free text query, the participant must enter any text. This is matched with the provided reference value.
description.SurveyQuestion: Surveys may contain any number of answers, none of them can be marked as right or wrong.
description.ABCDSurveyQuestion: ABCD questions contain at maximum 26 answers (from A - Z).
description.type_wrapper: Here you can change the type of quiz question. Each type has different settings. Change the type by clicking on the respective box.

notification.request-permission: Do you want to receive a notification when your question for the Quiz-Pool has been approved?

pending-pool-question.title: New Quiz-Pool {amount, plural, =0{questions} one{question} other{questions} }
pending-pool-question.body: {amount, plural, =0{0 questions are} one{One question is} other{{amount} questions are} } waiting for approval in the Quiz-Pool

pool-question-approved.title: Quiz-Pool question approved
pool-question-approved.body: One of your Quiz-Pool questions was approved!

hotkey.navigate-to-question-text: Navigate to the question text view
hotkey.navigate-to-question-type: Navigate to the question type view
